price: "Como se, jamais, lá houvessem morado. Ora, para trás! Para Madian! Como houve para trás! Para Thamud!"
arabic: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّمَدۡيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَمُودُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā alā buʿ'dan limadyana kamā baʿidat thamūdu
